ModMetaData.name: XSTAT, first-in-kind hemostatic device for gunshot
ModMetaData.author: Fortified_home
ModMetaData.description: This mod Simply adds XSTAT, which is invented to stop bleeding from gunshot, and shrapnel wounds. Requires Penoxycyline Production research, can be crafted in drug table, 20 cloth and 3 Medicineherbal to craft.
